title: Augmented Reality-based Science Inquiry Project: Experiential Learning Using EDMV-AR

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific inquiry procedures (observation, hypothesis formation, experimental design) and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Program to cultivate pre-service teachers' ability to design AR-based science inquiry lessons for elementary students. Utilizes smartphone-based technological environments accessible in school settings

learning_goals: Learners can design inquiry projects to observe scientific phenomena and analyze experimental variables using AR simulation tools.
Learners can plan three or more scientific inquiry activities according to the EDMV-AR model (Experience-Deconstruction-Modeling-Verification) and evaluate execution results.
Learners can complete science inquiry projects through team-based collaboration, achieving 80% or higher in learning engagement and problem-solving competencies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
